name: Let'sTalkSoccer
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Football. Soccer. Futbol. Wherever you're from and whatever you call it, you love The Beautiful Game. So do we. We're a father and son team that lives the sport. Our daily briefings will focus primarily on the Premier League and Fantasy Premier League. On the Fantasy side, we offer information and tips - everything you'll need to put manage your best FPL team. But, we go further and deeper with the content to include major news events, such as player transfer, as well as big stories from other domestic leagues, the big tournaments (think: Champions League), and all the notable and newsworthy players. We provide insights and perspectives that you won't find anywhere else. We know our stuff and deliver it in a passionate and fun way. Also, check us out on Instagram - @ LetsTalkSoccer - where you'll find even more information and entertainment related to the game. We hope you enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
